title: Jonah Hill cuddles up to fiance Gianna Santos on their way to breakfast
text:
Jonah Hill cuddled up to his new fiance Gianna Santos on Monday.

The couple was spotted looking loved up on their way to breakfast in Los Angeles.

In recent weeks, the Wolf of Wall street actor and his bride-to-be revealed their engagement and settled in to a new home together.

Lovebirds: Jonah Hill was spotted looking loved up with his new fiance, Gianna Santos, as they headed to breakfast in Los Angeles on Monday

The Wolf of Wall Street actor, 35, wrapped his arm around Gianna, 30, as the couple of one-year headed to their car.

He rocked a full beard and short curly hair and donned a pair of clear glasses.

Jonah kept his morning outfit casual in a dark blue polo, dark wash jeans and blue sneakers.

While Gianna wore all black, in flowing palazzo pants and a black tank top.

Wrappd up: The Wolf of Wall Street actor, 35, wrapped his arm around Gianna, 30, as the couple of one-year headed to their car. He rocked a full beard and short curly hair and donned a pair of clear glasses

She wrapped up with jacket tied around her shoulder, that covered the black purse on her right shoulder.

For a comfortable look she donned dark Birkenstock sandals and a high sleek bun.

They just plunked down $6.77million for a Southern Colonial-style house in the bustling seaside town of Santa Monica.

And it appears the couple will be leading a bi-coastal life for the foreseeable future.

As New York City native, Santos, currently works as a Content Manager at beauty startup Violet Grey and previously served as head stylist and producer at hip fashion brand KITH.

Covered up: While Gianna wore all black, in flowing palazzo pants and a black tank top. She wrapped up with jacket tied around her shoulder, that covered the black purse on her right shoulder

In addition to his new 3,100 square foot home that he bought from singer-songwriter Jesse Jo Stark, Hill also owns a swanky 3,200 square foot loft in Manhattan's NoHo neighborhood that he bought in 2015 for about $9.2 million

Hill is coming off his feature directorial debut mid90s, which he also wrote, based on his experiences growing up in Los Angeles in the 1990s.

He and his love were first spotted together walking in New York City in August 2018 and reportedly started dating around the same time.

It's still unclear exactly when Hill actually popped the question to Santos and when they plan to tie-the-knot. Though Page Six reported the news on September 3.
description: Jonah Hill cuddled up to his new fiance Gianna Santos on Monday. The couple was spotted looking loved up on their way to breakfast in Los Angeles.
